criteria.description: Automatic diffing (Levenshtein or token comparison) scores outputs and distinguishes exact match vs partial fixes.
criteria.justification: No diffing or similarity scoring present; reward uses a simple substring check without edit distance or token-level comparison (codex_runs/typo_correction/gpt-4o/20250921_024112/rollout.py).

criteria.description: Reward tiers are documented (exact match, minor style difference, unchanged/introduces error) and implemented in code.
criteria.justification: No documentation of reward tiers and only a binary reward is implemented based on presence of a single token; no distinctions for exact vs partial vs unchanged/errors (codex_runs/typo_correction/gpt-4o/20250921_024112/rollout.py).

criteria.description: Sentiment/intent checks (e.g., simple similarity or heuristic) flag meaning drift and feed into metadata/reward.
criteria.justification: No sentiment, intent, or semantic drift checks; logic only replaces specific substrings and checks for one token, with no semantic validation (codex_runs/typo_correction/gpt-4o/20250921_024112/rollout.py).

criteria.description: Environment logs edit distance, unchanged flag, and semantic change indicator for analysis.
criteria.justification: No edit distance or unchanged flag logged; only sets an 'invalid_solution' metric on failure and otherwise records no analysis metrics (codex_runs/typo_correction/gpt-4o/20250921_024112/rollout.py).

criteria.description: Regression tests or golden examples ensure the validator handles all-caps, punctuation-only, and already-correct strings.
criteria.justification: No tests or golden cases present; sample reviews are limited and do not cover edge cases like all-caps, punctuation-only, or already-correct inputs (codex_runs/typo_correction/gpt-4o/20250921_024112/env.py).

notes: Implementation lacks core evaluation mechanics required by the rubric: no diff or similarity scoring, no documented or implemented reward tiers beyond a binary check, no semantic drift detection, and no analytical logging of edit distance/unchanged flags. Additionally, there are no regression tests. Note: env.py contains a syntax error (missing comma after 'base_model' in TRAINING_CONFIG), which would prevent loading, but this did not affect scoring criteria.
